Producer: Robert De Niro, Jane Rosenthal, Jon Poll
Screenwriter: John Hamburg, Jim Herzfeld, Marc Hyman
Synopsis: Now that Greg Focker is "in" with his soon-to-be in-laws, Jack and Dina Byrnes, it looks like smooth sailing for him and his fianc√©e, Pam. But that's before Pam's parents meet Greg's parents, the Fockers. The hyper-relaxed Fockers and the tightly-wound Byrneses are woefully mismatched from the start, and no matter how hard Greg and Pam try, there is just no bringing their families together. This all adds up to a disastrously funny time of getting to know you.
Title: Meet the Fockers
